name: hpc-ssh-key-portal
description: Secure portal for managing SSH keys used to access HPC systems

scripts.setup:detect-platform: node -e "const os=require('os'); const platform=os.platform(); if(platform==='win32'){console.log('Windows detected. Options:'); console.log('1. Auto-install make: choco install make -y (then: make auto-setup)'); console.log('2. Use batch script: setup-windows.bat auto-setup')}else{console.log('Unix detected. Options:'); console.log('1. With make: make auto-setup'); console.log('2. Install make: sudo apt install build-essential (Ubuntu) or brew install make (macOS)')}"
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../backend-py && python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:windows: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend-py && python -m pip install -r requirements-windows.txt
scripts.test: echo 'Running tests...' && cd backend-py && python -m pytest tests/ -v && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.help: echo 'Available commands: npm run setup (shows all options), npm run dev, npm run build, npm run test, npm run clean'
